txt.en: Examine a carving to hear the history of the Drúedain ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Suitable wood for carving can be found in Taur Drúadan.\n\nFind a piece of wood for Khûr-pulo-Skâl to make a carving for you.
Wood carvings can be found in Drû Bhûta.\n\nExamine wood carvings to hear the history of the Drúedain.
'Listen. This wood is you. Hear the story within. I carve you. Come back soon.'\n\nThe Wose begins to whittle away on the wood you gave him.
Find a suitable piece of wood for carving
Suitable wood for carving can be found in Taur Drúadan.\n\nFind a piece of wood for Khûr-pulo-Skâl to make a carving for you.
Khûr-pulo-Skâl can be found in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should bring the wood to Khûr-pulo-Skâl.
Find a suitable piece of wood for carving
Khûr-pulo-Skâl can be found in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should bring the wood to Khûr-pulo-Skâl.
'We Drúedain put our history in carvings. Point to carving and hear story of Drúedain.\n\n'Then, if find right wood, could carve story of you one day.'
Speak with Khûr-pulo-Skâl
Khûr-pulo-Skâl can be found in Drû Bhûta.\n\nWait for Khûr-pulo-Skâl to finish carving.
Khûr-pulo-Skâl can be found in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should bring the wood to Khûr-pulo-Skâl.
It looks like Khûr-pulo-Skâl has finished carving
'Carving done. Look, gift for you. Part of your story.'\n\nThe Wose holds up a miniature wooden figurine that shares a remarkable likeness of yourself.
Wait for Khûr-pulo-Skâl to finish carving
'This wood not right. It speak not for you. Get different wood. Try again.'\n\nIt seems that the Wose is looking for a particular type of wood but he gives no clues as to what type of wood to gather.
Speak with Khûr-pulo-Skâl
Khûr-pulo-Skâl wants to teach you about the history of the Woses.
Heard the history of the Drúedain ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
This wood seems good for carving
Speak with Khûr-pulo-Skâl
This wood also seems good for carving
A Carving of History
